author: https://www.facebook.com/bbcnews
title: Hackers steal $600m in major cryptocurrency heist
description: Thousands of digital tokens have been stolen by hackers in one of the largest cryptocurrency heists.
content:
Hackers have stolen some $600m (£433m) in what appears to be one the largest cryptocurrency heists ever. 
Blockchain site Poly Network said hackers had exploited a vulnerability in its system and ta… [+864 chars]
